answers.answer: So sorry to hear that you are going through a hard time with preeclampcia. I had it with my first and had him at 31 weeks, now I'm pregnant with my second and am hoping to avoid it. I'm 35 and 4 days and on a blood pressure meds. Preeclampcia is a nasty Rollercoaster ride emotionally, mentally and physically. I wish you the best of luck and a safe and healthy delivery for the two of you.

question: I'm having the worst problems from it and feel miserable. Between the headaches, bp swings, muscle cramps, and exhaustion idk how much more I can take. Are you ladies with preeclampsia having similar problems? 34wks4days
title: Preeclampsia problems
